charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] went to the ruins to
join Cynthia for some fieldwork.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_020:
Thanks for joining me today! I hope it’s not too
much of a bother.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_030:
I tend to notice things when you’re around, so I
figured I’d invite you.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_040:
Now...I wonder what region and era these ruins
are based on.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_0401_060: Oh! Sorry for surprising you like that.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_0402_080:
Sorry if that surprised you. That was quite sudden,
wasn’t it.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_100:
Giratina’s actually from a different world, one on
the reverse side of ours.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_110:
It’s able to move freely between our world and
that other world...
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_120:
But sometimes it even surprises me because it
pops up out of nowhere!
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_130: I’m sure it means no harm, though.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_140:
You know, I’ve actually been to the world
Giratina is from.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_150:
Time didn’t flow, and space wasn’t stable... It was
a world where the rules are broken.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_160: It was a space one might call the Distortion World.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_170:
There are a few existing theories as to why
Giratina was in a world like that.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_180:
According to one, Giratina was banished to
another world for its violence.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_190:
However, as I kept examining myths and
reference materials from different angles, I started
to uncover the truth.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_200:
I think Giratina is actually a kind soul,
watching over our world from the shadows to
protect us.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_210: Oh! I guess Giratina went back to its world.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_220:
Maybe it just dropped in to say hello to
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_0401_240:
That’s right. We spend a lot of time apart from
each other.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_0302_260: Isn’t it lonely when Giratina’s gone?
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_0402_270: Oh, I’m actually OK with it.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_280:
Even when we’re worlds apart, we’re always
together in spirit.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_290: I know that Giratina will always be there for me.
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_300:
I’m sure it’s even watching over us now, as
we speak!
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_310:
OK! That’s enough of a break. Shall we get back
to work?
charaepi_ch0091_20_shirona/2301_1201_320:
I certainly can’t leave here empty-handed.
Giratina would have a good laugh at me.
